title: Missing items in release tarball

comments.content:
Some directories are missing in the tarballs:
  ./bzrplugins
  ./contrib
  ./locale
  ./plugins
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Soren ISTR you hacked a new Hudson job to track the diff between branch and tarball, could we use it to check ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Checked that all items are now in the tarball produced by "python setup.py sdist".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: The linked branch still uses 2011.1 as the version.  Depending on whether we release the resulting tarball as nova-2011.1-full.tar.gz or as nova-2011.1.1.tar.gz (will be discussed at the weekly meeting today), we might need to push a version change as well.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
<jaypipes> ttx: translations aren't in there as binary files.
<jaypipes> ttx: still working on that...please don't merge it into bexar trunk yet :)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
validating fix with build bzr651:

--- /tmp/branch_contents
+++ /tmp/tarball_contents
-./.bzr
-./.bzr/branch
-./.bzr/branch/branch.conf
-./.bzr/branch-format
-./.bzr/branch/format
-./.bzr/branch/last-revision
-./.bzr/branch-lock
-./.bzr/branch/lock
-./.bzr/branch/tags
-./.bzr/checkout
-./.bzr/checkout/conflicts
-./.bzr/checkout/dirstate
-./.bzr/checkout/format
-./.bzr/checkout/lock
-./.bzr/checkout/views
-./.bzrignore
-./.bzr/README
+./bzrplugins/novalog/__init__.pyc
+./ChangeLog
-./doc/source/api
-./.gitignore
-./.mailmap
+./nova.egg-info
+./nova.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
+./nova.egg-info/PKG-INFO
+./nova.egg-info/SOURCES.txt
+./nova.egg-info/top_level.txt
+./nova/vcsversion.py
+./PKG-INFO
+./smoketests/__init__.pyc

The only things that don't look like valid build artifacts to me are:
+./bzrplugins/novalog/__init__.pyc
-./doc/source/api
+./smoketests/__init__.pyc

bzrplugins/novalog/__init__.pyc gets generated by setup.py execution. smoketests/__init__.pyc apparently gets generated by find_packages(exclude=['bin', 'smoketests'])... I think we should add a global-exclude *.pyc to MANIFEST.in to get rid of them.

doc/source/api is an empty directory, I think it's safe for the tarball not to ship it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
validating fix against candidate build bzr653:

--- /tmp/branch_contents	2011-02-25 11:06:11.512406424 +0100
+++ /tmp/tarball_contents	2011-02-25 11:07:07.815363668 +0100
-./.bzr
-./.bzr/branch
-./.bzr/branch/branch.conf
-./.bzr/branch-format
-./.bzr/branch/format

-./.bzr/checkout

-./.bzr/checkout/dirstate
-./.bzr/checkout/format
-./.bzr/checkout/lock
-./.bzr/checkout/views
-./.bzrignore
-./.bzr/README
+./ChangeLog
-./doc/source/api

-./.mailmap
+./nova.egg-info
+./nova.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
+./nova.egg-info/PKG-INFO
+./nova.egg-info/SOURCES.txt
+./nova.egg-info/top_level.txt
+./nova/vcsversion.py

I think that is correct.
